Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at 59th/Emerald
ShortDescription: #59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Halsted, 55th, Union, and 59th, due to fire department activity near 59th/Emerald.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Halsted, 55th, Union, and 59th, then resume their normal route, due to fire department activity near 59th/Emerald.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange and Harlem bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange and Harlem bound Green Line trains are running with delays at Roosevelt due to an earlier door problem. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange and Harlem bound Green Line trains are running with delays at Roosevelt due to an earlier door problem.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
